problem.p: What is your level of expertise in mathematics? If your last exposure to mathematics was more than one year ago, please check the last box as well.

choice.name: college_calc
choice.text: One semester of calculus in college

choice.name: hs_calc
choice.text: One semester of calculus in high school

choice.name: hs_math
choice.text: More than two years of mathematics in high school

choice.name: hs_calc
choice.text: Two years of mathematics or less in high school

choice.name: old_math_xp
choice.text: My last exposure to mathematics (at any level) was more than one year ago and I do not use it in my job
